attributes.action: reconsider the Bradley/Eames proposal of payouts to 'terrorists' and their families.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We propose that the government reconsider this proposal, which 
would lay open old wounds and cause resentment between the two 
main fractions during 'The Troubles'. Would it include all 
the families of the Armed Forces personnel who lost their 
lives, the policemen & women, or indeed the families of any 
innocents? 

I implore you, Prime Minister and your governement to seriously consider revoking this idea that would be a misuse of an already beleaugered taxpayers money.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
